txt.en: 'You chose a few spots that I would not have, but... all in all, you have done well.\n\n'It is a relaxing pastime, is it not?'
Bráthur can be found at Khadâsh-gâra in Elderslade.\n\nYou have set many traps on the outskirts of Khadâsh-gâra. You should return to Bráthur.
Set traps on the outskirts of Khadâsh-gâra ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
One of the Want-kin, Bráthur, is an accomplished trapper and enjoys hunting the beasts of Elderslade.
Khadâsh-gâra can be found in eastern Elderslade.\n\nBráthur has asked you to set traps on the outskirts of Khadâsh-gâra.
Set traps on the outskirts of Khadâsh-gâra ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'I sense that a life so quaint is not your way, traveller.

'For my part, I find there is much joy to be found in simple tasks. Take setting traps, for instance. It is like an even easier... and even slower sort of fishing!

'Here, set these traps about outside Khadâsh-gâra. Perhaps you'll find something unexpected in the work!'
